website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Kamikaze II Mid is both an on-court performer and a fashionable sneaker. Its old-school design attracts many buyers who want to have it for casual use. They pair it with long or short pants, and rock the streets with style.As for performance, several compliment the total durability of the shoe. Indoors or outdoors, the shoe can withstand both clean and dusty courts. The leather upper receives praises for its comfort and flexibility. At $100, the Reebok Kamikaze II Mid is just hard to resist.
pros: The majority of comments is about how comfortable the Reebok Kamikaze II Mid is
A lot of wearers agree that the shoe is durable enough for outdoor hoops
The basketball sneaker fits true-to-size, claim plenty of buyers
Many users are fascinated with the classic design of the shoe model
This impression goes with the first basketball shoe of Michael Jordan as well as the eleventh Jordan shoe model
Most young wearers enjoy the glow-in-the-dark upper of the Reebok Kamikaze II Mid
Some shoe owners give feedback that the upper leather is soft and comfortable
A good number of reviewers say that the thick grooves of the outsole grips clean and dusty court floors well
Wearers young and old love the street style of the Reebok Kamikaze II Mid
cons: The Reebok Kamikaze II Mid runs big, claim at least three users
The insoles of these mid-top shoe for basketball is thin and does not provide any comfort, remark a few wearers
A wearer with narrow feet leaves a comment that the shoe has no foot containment
A few complain that the shoe lacks ventilation

customer_reviews.title: For those who cannot wear the ussual narrow Nikes.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for people who have wide feet and thus trouble finding basketball shoes to fit them. I have worm these for at least 20 hours of basketball, and they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sneaker. The Hexalite Honeycomb insert provides excellent cushioning ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Sneaker. The Hexalite Honeycomb insert provides excellent cushioning and comfort. I've worn wear these with jeans and get compliments on them. A great sneaker in the collection for any sneakerhead. I have these "ghosts of christmas past" and the all teal "easter" color ways.
customer_reviews.author: RickRude

customer_reviews.title: He loved them and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my nephew. He loved them and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nelli

customer_reviews.title: It's a show stopper.
customer_reviews.text: I see people secretly taking pictures of my sneakers on my feet when I'm not looking.
customer_reviews.author: leon wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very nice and comfortable. Like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Alister Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well-made!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived faster than expected. I believe it was three days from time order. Very well made and ultra-fly on your feet. Even though they feel it's a little tight. They're not that bad. A bargain for the money. I had recommend the sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Robb Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Best bball shoes ever made
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. I am a U.S. 16 in Nike Jordan's but these U.S. 15 kamikaze's fit well. I remembered they were a big fit from when I got the original ones 19 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brett R Trembath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves them. He wears them so much I wonder do he sleep in them.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Peele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They came as expected and are the quality I expected
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and great design and for a good price. Amazon almost has everything in the world
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M. Gonzalez

product_meta.title: Reebok Kamikaze II Mid Mens Basketball Shoes Model V61434
product_meta.description: Kamikaze II Mid Mens in White/Steel/Excellent Red.
feature_bullets: Feature the performance details you need to take the court by storm
Lightweight Hexalite cushioning in the forefoot and Ultra Hexalite in the heel help to absorb shock
